Reference:
Seong YB, Owen LA, Bishop MP, Bush A, Clendon P, Copland L, Finkel R, Kamp U, Shroder JF, 2007. Quaternary glacial history of the central Karakoram. Quaternary Science Reviews 26, 3384-3405.

Data comments:
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
Sampling year assumed to be 2005.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology.

expage.github.io - data from expage-201910
